alert.note: Alert for Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Western Clinton; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 04 at 3:31AM EST until February 04 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches for a storm total of 9 to 14 inches. * WHERE...Southeastern St. Lawrence, Western Essex, Southern Franklin and Western Clinton Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Moderate to heavy snow will continue this morning and taper off around mid-day before ending this afternoon.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Western Clinton; Western Essex
